body:
Context for the Bros who can't understand Japanese.
Pareo wants to serve ChuChu better so she applied for a maid job not knowing that it's actually a brothel. She planned to work only for a week. She then stumbled upon the room and the guy tells her to have sex with him. She doesn't like the idea at first but she thought that what she will do is for ChuChu so she had sex with the guy anyway. This continued on until the last day of the week where she eventually enjoys the time with the guy. (In one panel she said "I am violated and it continues" so she doesn't like it at all except in the final day. After quitting the maid job, she then goes to ChuChu to serve her better. (But actually learned the wrong part about being a maid).
